sys_hub_flow_input.name: var__m_sys_hub_flow_input_668660a0070a0110ac9bf8ed7c1ed075

sys_variable_value.value:
Dear User, 

We have noticed that your product has been on Green Swap Shop for longer than 30 days.

Unfortunately the next step we would recommend is to donate to your local charity which we would be happy to provide information on.

Please keep an eye out on this email,

Best regards,

Team Green Swap Shop :)

sys_variable_value.value:
Dear User, 

We have noticed that your product has been on Green Swap Shop for longer than 30 days.

Unfortunately the next step we would recommend is to donate to your local charity which we would be happy to provide information on.

Please keep an eye out on this email,

Best regards,

Team Green Swap Shop :)
